articles.description: Tampa Bay Buccaneers quarterback Tom Brady, 43, threw the ball to New Orleans' Saints quarterback Drew Brees' son, Baylen, telling him: 'We could have used you tonight!'
articles.content:
NFL star Tom Brady shared a touching moment with rival Drew Brees and his kids after the Tampa Bay Buccaneers ended the New Orleans Saints' Super Bowl dreams Sunday night.

articles.content:
